| History                 = 
===Overview===
The '''Sandstormers''' were a tribe of raiders and scavengers from the ancient [[Egypt]]. They were lead by the ruthless [[Baal (Sandstormers) (Earth-616)|Baal]].{{r|Rise of Apocalypse #1}}

===Events===
When [[Nathaniel Richards (Rama-Tut) (Earth-6311)|Kang]] traveled to past, he was found by the Sandstormers and Baal named him Rama-Tut - the visitor from beyond the sun. Rama-Tut fled and became Pharaoh of Egypt, but lost his [[Time-Ship]] in the desert.{{r|Rise of Apocalypse #1}}

Years later, Sandstormers massacred the [[Clan Akkaba (Earth-616)|Clan Akkaba]], and found a newborn baby, who was named [[En Sabah Nur (Earth-616)|En Sabah Nur]] - the first one. Baal raised the child as his own son and brought him to the Kang's time-ship, where Nur learned his fate and became Apocalypse.{{r|Rise of Apocalypse #2}}
